system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 30% chance of gaining @Affliction[splinter] 5.

Requirement: [Dragon] Z-Crystal as an Accessory Item and a Dragon-Type attack on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Devastating Drake

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Crystal.
